subject: This department writes to info
body:
This department writes to inform you that we have received instructions from the World Bank to transfer your $10 million fund total to you, and after we met this morning, we have decided to pay you by online bank transfer.
Kindly get back to us for more details on how you will receive your payment. via online banking.
Regards
Mrs. Mary Anderson.

subject: Re: This department writes to info
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Anderson,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the transfer of my million fund. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. Could you please provide me with more details on how I can receive the payment via online banking? I want to make sure that everything is done securely and efficiently.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mike
